item.title: Undraw
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: Undraw offers a wide range of free open source illustrations by Katerina Limpitsouni
item.content:encoded: Undraw offers a wide range of free open source illustrations by Katerina Limpitsouni

item.title: Stockio
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: Stockio is another source for free stock photos, vector graphics, and icons.
item.content:encoded: Stockio is another source for free stock photos, vector graphics, and icons.

item.title: Pexels
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: Pexels is a stock photography site. The pictures are free for personal and even for commercial use. You can modify, copy and distribute the photos. All without asking for permission or setting a link to the source. So, attribution is not required. All contents are released under Creative Commons CC0 (Public Domain).
item.content:encoded:
Pexels is a stock photography site.  The pictures are free for personal and even for commercial use.
You can modify, copy and distribute the photos. All without asking for permission or setting a link to the source. So, attribution is not required. All contents are released under Creative Commons CC0 (Public Domain).

item.title: Unsplash
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description:
Unsplash (https://unsplash.com/) offers free “do whatever you want” high-resolution photos with no attribution. They have their own “Unsplash” license that essentially says you can do whatever you want, so long as you do not try to sell them via a similar service. If you are using Unsplash for mockups, check out Lorem Picsum (https://picsum.photos/). It …

Unsplash Read More »
item.content:encoded:
Unsplash (https://unsplash.com/) offers free “do whatever you want” high-resolution photos with no attribution. They have their own “Unsplash” license that essentially says you can do whatever you want, so long as you do not try to sell them via a similar service.

If you are using Unsplash for mockups, check out Lorem Picsum (https://picsum.photos/). It is a placeholder image tool that can randomly serve images from Unsplash at different dimensions.

item.title: Pixabay
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description:
Pixabay is a free stock photography site that offers free images and videos you can use anywhere. Made up of community of creatives, sharing copyright free images and videos, all contents are released under Creative Commons CC0 (Public Domain), which makes them safe to use without attribution (asking for permission or giving credit to the …

Pixabay Read More »
item.content:encoded: Pixabay is a free stock photography site that offers free images and videos you can use anywhere. Made up of community of creatives, sharing copyright free images and videos, all contents are released under Creative Commons CC0 (Public Domain), which makes them safe to use without attribution (asking for permission or giving credit to the artist) even for commercial purposes.
